title: Sad Situation
raw_lyrics:
Well I’ve known some sad situations before
And I’ve faced a lot of temptations before
Yes I’ve known others like you with a heart made of stone
And by now I guess I should be used to living alone

It’s a sad situation not just because I’m so blue
It’s a sad situation cause I’m still loving you

I never thought I’d be feeling like this
Living on memories of your tender kiss
You’re not the first one that I thought my heart wanted so
But you’ll be the first to take part of me when you go

lines: Well I’ve known some sad situations before
And I’ve faced a lot of temptations before
Yes I’ve known others like you with a heart made of stone
And by now I guess I should be used to living alone
It’s a sad situation not just because I’m so blue
It’s a sad situation cause I’m still loving you
I never thought I’d be feeling like this
Living on memories of your tender kiss
You’re not the first one that I thought my heart wanted so
But you’ll be the first to take part of me when you go
